metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15141 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: WriteTIFFImage in coders/tiff.c in ImageMagick 7.0.8-43 Q16 allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service (application crash resulting from a heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted TIFF image file, related to TIFFRewriteDirectory, TIFFWriteDirectory, TIFFWriteDirectorySec, and TIFFWriteDirectoryTagColormap in tif_dirwrite.c of LibTIFF. NOTE: this occurs because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2019-11597.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> included as part of CVE-2019-11597 fix

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
